execution_plan.description: Select ids of goods categorized as bakery.
execution_plan.query: SELECT goods.id AS s1__id FROM goods WHERE goods.food = 'bakery';

execution_plan.description: Find receipts that contain those bakery goods (match items.Item to goods.id).
execution_plan.query: SELECT items.Receipt AS s2__Receipt, items.Item AS s2__Item FROM items WHERE items.Item IN ($step1.s1__id);

execution_plan.description: Map those receipts to customer ids from receipts.
execution_plan.query: SELECT receipts.ReceiptNumber AS s3__ReceiptNumber, receipts.CustomerId AS s3__CustomerId FROM receipts WHERE receipts.ReceiptNumber IN ($step2.s2__Receipt);
